now

so uh where you could build a lot of

so we wanted to build a dynamic cms

another part of that was because we
wanted to be able to load up a bunch of

and time that content so that it just

so a lot of the inspiration for

carried on in the tradition of jekyll
and hugo and the static site generators

so of course we added a scripting

uh very easy for us as as rust

uh i was
helm is one of my projects and i think

made with helm if not the biggest
was not thinking hard about the template

template language at the time nobody was
really using it i spent lots and lots of

frustrating to a number of people i
think it still is one of the more
frustrating features of helm and so as
we approached this i went all right i'm
going to take a very different approach
instead of going with you know what's
the most ready at hand one i'm going to
go find one that people say they like
and i'm going to use that one instead
handlebars was very popular in the
javascript world has lots and lots of
people who use it there are books about

and i'm like okay well that will work so
we found a handlebars library
and used that as a template engine
we also wanted to make sure as a new
company entering a new space that we had
a lot of seo optimizations a lot of
performance optimizations
because
one of the important things to us is if
we're going to tell people about

he's an amazing designer an amazing html
